hero.subtitle: Over {count} vintage vehicles for your film

about.title: About Us
about.description1: Since 1980, Il Sorpasso has been the reference point for vintage car rental in the Italian and international film industry.
about.description2: Our passion for historic cars and deep knowledge of the film industry have allowed us to build one of the largest collections of vintage vehicles in Europe.
about.description3: We collaborate with the most important production houses, guaranteeing not only the means but also historical consulting and technical support for any type of project.

supercar.title: SUPERCAR
supercar.subtitle: Power and prestige
supercar.description: Modern and vintage supercars for high-impact scenes
supercar.longDescription: Our supercar collection includes the most iconic and desired models, from legendary vintage Ferrari and Lamborghini to the latest McLaren and Porsche.

moderne.title: Modern Supercars
moderne.description: Latest generation Lamborghini, Ferrari, McLaren, Porsche

tuning.title: TUNING CARS & MUSCLE CAR
tuning.subtitle: American power
tuning.description: Ford Mustang, Chevrolet Corvette, modified and racing cars
tuning.longDescription: A selection of American muscle cars and tuning cars for action scenes and urban settings. Includes Ford Mustang, Chevrolet Corvette, Dodge Challenger and modified cars.

militari.title: MILITARY VEHICLES
militari.subtitle: Guaranteed authenticity
militari.description: Vintage and modern military vehicles for war scenes
militari.longDescription: From Jeep Willys to modern Humvee, we offer a wide range of authentic military vehicles for documentaries, war films and historical productions.

epoca.title: Vintage Military Vehicles
epoca.description: Jeep Willys, Dodge WC, Lancia truck

motociclette.title: MOTORCYCLES
motociclette.subtitle: Legendary two wheels
motociclette.description: Modern and vintage motorcycles of all types
motociclette.longDescription: From vintage Harley Davidson to modern sports Ducati, our motorcycle collection covers all styles and eras.

vintage.title: Vintage Motorcycles
vintage.description: Harley Davidson, Indian, Guzzi, Caf√© Racer

vespe.title: VESPA & LAMBRETTA
vespe.subtitle: Italian style
vespe.description: Complete collection all colors and models
vespe.longDescription: A complete collection of historic Vespa and Lambretta in all colors and models, symbol of Italian elegance on two wheels.

barche.title: BOATS & YACHTS
barche.subtitle: Luxury on the sea
barche.description: Vintage and modern boats, luxury yachts
barche.longDescription: From elegant vintage boats to modern luxury yachts, we offer vessels for all types of maritime scenes.

elicotteri.title: HELICOPTERS & AIRCRAFT
elicotteri.subtitle: Flying high
elicotteri.description: Civil and military helicopters, vintage and modern aircraft
elicotteri.longDescription: A fleet of helicopters and aircraft for spectacular aerial shots and action scenes, including civil, military and vintage vehicles.

carrozze.title: CARRIAGES
carrozze.subtitle: Elegance of bygone times
carrozze.longDescription: Perfectly restored historic carriages for period scenes, weddings and special events that require a touch of traditional elegance.

biciclette.title: BICYCLES
biciclette.subtitle: Sustainable mobility
biciclette.longDescription: A vast collection of bicycles ranging from vintage classics to modern city bikes, mountain bikes, racing and special bikes like tandems.

tuscany.title: Tuscany
tuscany.description: Scenic roads through hills and vineyards

sicily.title: Sicily
sicily.description: Between history and crystal clear sea

experience.title: Years of Experience
experience.description: On the set of the most important Italian and international productions

coverage.title: National Coverage
coverage.description: Vehicles available throughout Italy to optimize transport costs

support.title: Always Ready
support.description: Quick response and immediate solutions for every production need

contact.subtitle: We're here to help you find the perfect vehicle for your project
